original_title: Deep Purple: ...To the Rising Sun in Tokyo
overview: Filmed by 12 HD cameras and recorded by a top mobile studio, the show offers one of the most magical performances of the NOW What?! tour. Every member of the band is in fantastic form, the band being strong from a full tour together, and the performance seems to be driving the band through the song like if audience and band were suspended in time.
title: Deep Purple: ...To the Rising Sun in Tokyo
